expandReach.title: Expand Your Reach
expandReach.description: At 'Nation Horses,' we connect riders with professionals, offering easy access to equestrian resources and knowledge.

horsesNation.title: Horses Nation
horsesNation.description: Join 'Horses Nation' for training, competitions, and a community focused on horse care.

elevateSkills.title: Elevate Your Skills
elevateSkills.description: Access resources for skill development, training, and competitions in the equestrian world.

welcome.title: Welcome to
welcome.subtitle: Your gateway to the world of equestrianism
welcome.description: Join us in a supportive environment where riders and their horses connect, grow, and thrive. From training to competitions, we aim to enrich your equestrian experience with resources, knowledge, and opportunities tailored to your needs.

workshops.title: Workshops & Training
workshops.description: Learn and enhance your equestrian skills through our expert-led workshops and training programs designed for all levels.

community.title: Community Connection
community.description: Connect with a network of riders, trainers, and enthusiasts to share experiences, exchange ideas, and build lasting relationships.

resources.title: Resources & Knowledge
resources.description: Access a wealth of resources, from proper horse care tips to marketing products and advertising your equestrian résumé.

empowering.title: Empowering
empowering.subtitle: Equestrian Connections
empowering.description: Discover a supportive platform where riders and horses thrive, offering resources for training, care, and skill development.

newsletter.title: Stay Connected with
newsletter.subtitle: Join Our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Receive the latest equestrian insights, tips, and special offers straight to your inbox.
